com.bigdata.rdf.sail.webapp.lbs

Interface IHostMetrics

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHostMetrics, CounterSetHostMetricsWrapper, GangliaHostMetricWrapper

    public interface IHostMetrics
    Generic interface exposes an abstract model of the performance metrics for a given host.
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String[] getMetricNames()
      Return the names of all known metrics.
      Number getNumeric(String name)
      Return a numeric representation of the named metric.
      <T extends Number>
      T      		 getNumeric(String name, T defaultValue)
      Return a numeric representation of the named metric.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumeric

        Number getNumeric(String name)
        Return a numeric representation of the named metric.
        Parameters:
        name - The metric.
        Returns:
        The numeric representation of that metric -or- null if there is no such metric available.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the name is null.

      • getNumeric

        <T extends Number> T getNumeric(String name,
                                T defaultValue)
        Return a numeric representation of the named metric.
        Parameters:
        name - The metric.
        defaultValue - The default value.
        Returns:
        The numeric representation of that metric -or- the defaultValue if there is no such metric available.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the name is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the defaultValue is null.

      • getMetricNames

        String[] getMetricNames()
        Return the names of all known metrics.
